title: DDFP 220: Giovani Bernard & Wild Card Weekend Preview
itunes:title: DDFP 220: Giovani Bernard & Wild Card Weekend Preview
description:
Shek & Rank are joined by Cincinnati Bengals rookie running back Giovani Bernard, who offers some perspective on the effect of cold weather on players and the upcoming wild-card playoff game against the San Diego Chargers. Shek & Rank then reveal their Wild Card Weekend picks and which matchups would be the most entertaining going forward in the postseason.  

Learn more about your ad-choices at https://www.iheartpodcastnetwork.com

See omnystudio.com/listener for privacy information.
